blogPost.excerpt: Beacons is a mobile website builder for creators on TikTok and Instagram, with e-commerce and monetization built in. Set up a beautiful page in one minute.
blogPost.body: Beacons is a mobile website builder for creators on TikTok and Instagram, with e-commerce and monetization built in. Set up a beautiful page in one minute.
blogPost.title: Beacons - Monetize your TikTok, Twitter, and Instagram bio links
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: Beacons是一款针对TikTok和Instagram上的创作者的移动网站建设工具，内置电子商务和货币化功能。一分钟就能建立一个漂亮的页面。
localize.tagline: 将您的TikTok、Twitter和Instagram生物链接货币化。

localize.description: Beacons是一款針對TikTok和Instagram上的創作者的移動網站建設工具，內置電子商務和貨幣化功能。一分鐘就能建立一個漂亮的頁面。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 9% over the past week, the 61st consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 73% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt

localize.full_text: 过去一周美国科维德-19住院人数下降9%，这是连续61天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。
過去一週美國科維德-19住院人數下降9%，這是連續61天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。

next.title: Americans ready to plow 10% of stimulus checks into bitcoin and stocks, survey says https://t.co/WlKu7nROUh

localize.full_text: 调查称，美国人准备将10%的刺激政策支票投入比特币和股票，https://t.co/WlKu7nROUh。
